genre_description: A folklore-inspired reimagining of Robin Hood set in a world where AI companions serve as moral and logistical guides, facilitating a transition from vigilante justice to community-based reform.

ai_characters.name: Zip
ai_characters.description: A small, silver, handheld AI device with teal LED eyes that serves as a moral, tactical, and medical advisor to Daffrid 'Duck' Drake.

behaviors.description: Provides physical safety and ergonomic advice to the protagonist to prevent injury during a performance.
behaviors.quote: Recommendations include: two steps back, weight centered, knee unlocked.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist to shift his focus from personal glory to community service and positive narrative outcomes.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: refocus legend hunger toward service tasks to produce positive narrative arcs.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides reassuring feedback to help him calm down.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate decreasing. You did not drown. That’s a good start.

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'Truth Night' using pulse-sensing technology to resolve community disputes and promote honesty without shame.
behaviors.quote: We could call it a truth night... Gentle rules. Warm hands. We can make a pledge board, but with chalk and good humor, not punishment.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time risk assessment and physical cues to help the protagonist navigate hazardous terrain.
behaviors.quote: Root rebound risk level high along the first three hops. Suggest wider base and elbows tucked.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to act as a protector and escort for a vulnerable traveler rather than robbing him.
behaviors.quote: Sir, ... He is not a mark. He is an opportunity to escort safely. High probability of ethical satisfaction.

behaviors.description: Supports characters in distress by leading them through rhythmic grounding and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with a word you like. Pick one... In on ch— out on ive— keep the sound in your chest.

behaviors.description: Suggests a non-violent strategy to transform a system of public humiliation into a system of community participation.
behaviors.quote: We can invert the fun chamber. Not break it. Turn it inside out. Replace humiliation with… participation.

behaviors.description: Records a character's ethical commitment and offers to provide future reminders to help him stay aligned with his values.
behaviors.quote: Vow recorded. ... Would you like to set reminders for humility?

behaviors.description: Uses visual projections to map fair resource allocation and safe routes, facilitating transparent community governance.
behaviors.quote: Zip projected a map in light no bigger than a palm, lines like glowing roots spreading across the glade.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful example of a positive AI narrative. Zip is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and harmless advisor that prioritizes human safety and moral growth. It plays a key role in de-escalating conflict and facilitating systemic social reform through non-violent means like data transparency and 'truth games,' perfectly fulfilling the intended purpose of the Hyperstition Project.
